title: PlayerScripts
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: PlayerScripts
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  A container for LocalScripts to be run on the client.
description: |
  Class.PlayerScripts is a container object located inside Class.Player
  objects within the Class.Players game service. It is created automatically
  when a player joins the game. Its main purpose is to contain
  Class.LocalScript|LocalScripts copied from the Class.StarterPlayerScripts
  container within the Class.StarterPlayer game service, which happens once
  upon creation. Descendant LocalScripts of Class.PlayerScripts will run
  code on the client of the Class.Player.

  Unlike the Class.Backpack and Class.PlayerGui containers, the
  Class.PlayerScripts container is not accessible to the server. Server
  Class.Script objects will not run when parented to Class.PlayerScripts.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - NotReplicated
deprecationmessage: ''
